course_title: Modern China in Film and Fiction
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 10 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
course_description: This course is an examination of twentieth-century Chinese society through cinematic productions and a critical reading of the writings of major Chinese writers in translation. Emphasis on self and society in a changing culture and the nature and function of literature in modern nation-building.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2449, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: G. Chen, Status: Wait List
